metadata.synopsis: Dialogue with the Toll collector.She will continuously, endlessly demand gold from the player. You can convince her to let you pass (hard persuade), or you will have to fight  (once you stop giving it gold, or once you run out of gold).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Gerringothe, the Tollhouse Master near-112; 27; -87

55.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Spotting you, Gerringothe lurches forward.NodeContext: a desperate, cacophonous howl

161.speaker: Player
161.text: I will bring an end to the curse that shrouds this land.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Ballads, sonnets, jigs - the list is endless, really.

42.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The creature is heaving, undulous with desire for gold.NodeContext: Roared with a shudder of pleasure on 'GOLD'.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: It seems to me you have enough.

17.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
17.text: NO - NO NO. YOU MUST PAY.
17.context: NodeContext: Desperate to convince you it needs gold.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: If I give you gold, what do I get in return?

41.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
41.text: YOU CAN PASS. BUT FIRST YOU MUST PAY.
41.context: NodeContext: Frantic, desperate, almost like smeagol trying to plead its case

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Only a fool's easily parted with gold - what's in it for me?

128.speaker: Player
128.text: Toss the creature a gold piece.

163.context: NodeContext: The player tosses a gold piece to the creature. Gerringothe absorbs the gold

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Toss the creature another gold piece.

119.context: NodeContext: The player tosses a gold piece to the creature. Gerringothe absorbs the gold

82.speaker: Player
82.text: I don't hand out so much gold for so little in return.

147.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
147.text: YOU MAY PASS THE RIVER. BUT FIRST YOU MUST PAY.
147.context: NodeContext: Frantic, desperate, almost like smeagol trying to plead its case

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Toss the creature a gold piece.

170.speaker: Player
170.text: Why stay in this rotted building? Take your gold and be free.

34.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
34.text: THE GOLD IS NOT FOR ME. THE GOLD IS FOR THE TOLL. I COLLECT THE TOLL. I COLLECT THE GOLD.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Says who? Seems to me there's no one here to oversee you.

78.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
78.context: NodeContext: Slipping into confusion. Dialogue ends after this and the monster is lost in thought/ confused by what the player has said.

30.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
30.text: I DO NOT NEED AN OVERSEER. I COLLECT THE GOLD! YOU - YOU MUST PAY!
30.context: NodeContext: Becoming enraged; attacks after this.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Haven't you heard? The local authority has decreed the gold belongs to the toll collector - you.

99.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
99.context: NodeContext: Slipping into confusion. Dialogue ends after this and the monster is lost in thought/ confused by what the player has said.

31.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
31.text: LIAR. LIAR! THE GOLD IS FOR THE TOLL. YOU MUST PAY. PAY!
31.context: NodeContext: Becoming enraged; attacks after this.

162.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
162.text: BUT... GOLD. GOLD. YOU... MUST PAY...
162.context: NodeContext: Losing heart. Peaceful and demure after this.

66.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
66.text: NO! YOU MUST PAY. YOU MUST PAY THE GOLD!
66.context: NodeContext: Absolutely enraged; attacks after this.

140.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
140.text: THE GOLD IS NOT FOR ME! NOR YOU! THE GOLD IS FOR THE TOLL! DON'T YOU SEE?! DON'T YOU SEE?!
140.context: NodeContext: Working herself into a rage, will attack after this.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: The happiness gold grants is temporary at best. Do not let your need for gold trap you here.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: I know lust and avarice when I see it. You'll never be happy, no matter how much gold I give you.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Your obsession with gold is hurting you. If you leave this place, maybe you can still be saved.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: You're an endless pit of avarice. I won't bow to your corrupt demands.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Enough! You're an embodiment of the curse and its corruption. You get nothing from me.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: You're corrupt. I don't take kindly to such tactics.

175.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
175.text: CORRUPTION - NO! GOLD - I NEED GOLD!
175.context: NodeContext: Affronted/ frantic - trying to explain

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Gold, indeed - not for the toll, but for yourself. Isn't that right?

171.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
171.text: NO! NO. FOR THE TOLL. YOU MUST PAY THE TOLL!
171.context: NodeContext: Faltering slightly. Player has convinced her.

168.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
168.context: NodeContext: You've confused her. She is docile now

14.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
14.text: NO! NO! YOU MUST PAY - YOU MUST PAY THE TOLL!
14.context: NodeContext: Affronted, furious, sure she can't be wrong.

143.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
143.context: NodeContext: She is deflated and defeated after the player has successfully convinced her she's in the wrong.

74.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
74.text: STAND DOWN? NO! YOU MUST PAY! YOU MUST PAY GOLD!
74.context: NodeContext: Furious. Will attack after this.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Requesting more than one toll per traveller is quite illegal, per the relevant statutes. What is your defence?

20.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
20.context: NodeContext: Roaring. Will attack after this.

28.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
28.text: NO! THE GOLD IS FOR THE TOLL. THE TOLL MUST BE PAID! YOU - YOU MUST PAY!

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I'm afraid I'm actually your replacement. You've been fired as toll collector - terribly sorry.

146.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
146.text: REPLACE... ME? NO... I REQUIRE GOLD!

24.speaker: Player
24.text: You've been promoted! You'll collect gold from a much better tollhouse.

160.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
160.text: GOLD. MORE GOLD? I REQUIRE GOLD.
160.context: NodeContext: A bit matter of fact, as if we didn't know this about her, without being TOO comedic

141.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
141.text: NO! I COLLECT THE TOLL. MORE GOLD - NOW!
141.context: NodeContext: Super aggro, will fight after this

61.speaker: Player
61.text: You've done a great job here. Really set the standard. But I'll take it from here.

108.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
108.context: NodeContext: questioning. defeated. Will be docile after this

169.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
169.text: YOU WILL TAKE NOTHING! YOU WILL PAY! GOLD! GOLD! GOLD!
169.context: NodeContext: Super agro, will attack after this.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: You dare to question their decision? Leave this place at once!

111.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
111.context: NodeContext: questioning. defeated. Will be docile after this

52.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
52.text: I WILL NOT LEAVE. I CANNOT LEAVE. I REQUIRE GOLD!
52.context: NodeContext: Super agro, will attack after this.

35.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
35.text: NO... NO! I REQUIRE GOLD. ME!

49.speaker: Player
49.text: I'm here to replace you as toll collector.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Gold is such a limited desire. With the right help, you could become so much more.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: The 'toll collector' scam is old and uninspired. Give it a rest - figure out a new trick.

98.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
98.text: TRICK? NO... GOLD! I REQUIRE GOLD!

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Yes, a trick - you're a trickster! You don't deserve the gold!

104.speaker: Player
104.text: Look, I've run this scam myself - I know it's a trick. A basic one at that.

123.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
123.text: A TRICK... I TRICK? NO NO NO!

178.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
178.text: I DO NOT TRICK. I COLLECT THE TOLL! YOU WILL PAY!

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I require passage - or your throat will be cut.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: Toss the creature a gold piece.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: How much do you want, exactly?

142.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Toll Collector absorbs a large pile of gold, glows brighter, and look satisfied, as if after a hefty meal

93.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: The toll collector leans toward the player, getting her mask close to their face, and shouts at them, before stepping back, ready to attack

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I have no more money to give.

95.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
95.text: IF YOU CANNOT PAY, YOU CANNOT PASS. GOLD. GOLD. GOLD!
95.context: NodeContext: Desperate, increasing frenzy leading to combat.

165.speaker: Player
165.text: You're a toll collector. Or you were, anyway.

45.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
45.text: I COLLECT THE GOLD. THE GOLD SO YOU MAY PASS.

173.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
173.text: ALL MUST PAY. ALL MUST PAY! GOLD. GOLD. GOLD!
173.context: NodeContext: Desperate, increasing frenzy leading to combat.

114.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
114.text: YOU CANNOT LEAVE. YOU MUST PAY.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Harmony and a greater understanding of this plane.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Everything from mephits to burning infernos - it depends on the day, really.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: Magical expertise. I have a presentation on Weave dissonance, if you'd like?

127.speaker: Player
127.text: Greater balance to the natural and civilised world, I hope.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Depends on the beast I'm hunting.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: I'm afraid I'm more of a taker than a bringer, if you catch my meaning.

94.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
94.text: YOU BROUGHT VIOLENCE. UNACCEPTABLE. BUT ALL CAN BE FORGIVEN. FOR THE RIGHT PRICE.
94.context: NodeContext: howling with anger on first phrases - more reasonable on last two phrases, hoping to get some cash out of the situation

112.speaker: Gerringothe Thorm
112.text: I COLLECT THE GOLD. THE GOLD SO YOU MAY PASS.
